languages.text: "Рок над нами, но, повинуясь чувству долга, я, Паскаль Ханейманн, буду защитникам техносородичам своим и поведу их в будущее. Один".
"Though our fate is implacable, I, Pasqal Haneumann, will follow my sense of duty and become a protector to my tech-brethren, leading them into the future. Alone."
languages.original_text: "Рок над нами, но, повинуясь чувству долга, я, Паскаль Ханейманн, буду защитникам техносородичам своим и поведу их в будущее. Один".

traits.locale_text: "Though our fate is implacable, I, Pasqal Haneumann, will follow my sense of duty and become a protector to my tech-kin who leads them into the future. Alone."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Though our fate is implacable, I, Pasqal Haneumann, will follow my sense of duty and become a protector to my tech-kin who leads them into the future. Alone."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Though our fate is implacable, I, Pasqal Haneumann, will follow my sense of duty and become a protector to my tech-brethren, leading them into the future. Alone."

traits.locale_text: "Though our fate is implacable, I, Pasqal Haneumann, will follow my sense of duty and become a protector to my tech-brethren, leading them into the future. Alone."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「無慈悲な運命をとおして、パスカル・ヘニュマンは己の義務感に従い、我が技術同胞の守護者となり、将来にわたって導こう。ひとりだけで」
languages.original_text: "Though our fate is implacable, I, Pasqal Haneumann, will follow my sense of duty and become a protector to my tech-brethren, leading them into the future. Alone."

traits.locale_text: 「無慈悲な運命をとおして、パスカル・ヘニュマンは己の義務感に従い、我が同胞の守護者となり、将来にわたって導こう。ひとりだけで」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “尽管我们的命运无法改变，但我，帕斯卡·哈努曼，将恪守我的责任感，成为我技术同胞的守护者。我将独自一人，带领他们走向未来。”
languages.original_text: "Though our fate is implacable, I, Pasqal Haneumann, will follow my sense of duty and become a protector to my tech-brethren, leading them into the future. Alone."

traits.locale_text: “尽管我们的命运无法改变，但我，帕斯卡·哈努曼，将恪守我的责任感，成为我技术同胞的守护者。我将独自一人，带领他们走向未来。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Bien que notre destin soit implacable, moi, Pasqal Haneumann, accomplirai mon devoir et assumerai le rôle de protecteur de mes technofrères afin de les guider vers l'avenir. Seul. »
languages.original_text: "Though our fate is implacable, I, Pasqal Haneumann, will follow my sense of duty and become a protector to my tech-brethren, leading them into the future. Alone."

traits.locale_text: « Bien que notre destin soit implacable, moi, Pasqal Haneumann, accomplirai mon devoir et assumerai le rôle de protecteur de mes technoconfrères afin de les guider vers l'avenir. Seul. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Aunque nuestro destino es inexorable. Yo, Pasqal Haneumann, seguiré mi sentido del deber y me convertiré en el protector de mis hermanos tecnosacerdotes, guiándolos hacia el futuro. Solo».
languages.original_text: "Though our fate is implacable, I, Pasqal Haneumann, will follow my sense of duty and become a protector to my tech-brethren, leading them into the future. Alone."

traits.locale_text: «Aunque nuestro destino es inexorable. Yo, Pasqal Haneumann, seguiré mi sentido del deber y me convertiré en el protector de mis tecnosacerdotes allegados, guiándolos hacia el futuro. Solo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Unser Schicksal ist zwar unversöhnlich, doch ich, Pasqal Haneumann, werde meinem Pflichtgefühl folgen und zu einem Beschützer meiner Tech-Verwandtschaft werden und sie in die Zukunft führen. Allein."
languages.original_text: "Though our fate is implacable, I, Pasqal Haneumann, will follow my sense of duty and become a protector to my tech-brethren, leading them into the future. Alone."

traits.locale_text: "Unser Schicksal ist zwar unversöhnlich, doch ich, Pasqal Haneumann, werde meinem Pflichtgefühl folgen und zu einem Beschützer meiner Tech-Verwandtschaft werden und sie in die Zukunft führen. Allein."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Pasqal Haneumann olarak ben, kaderimiz değiştirilemez olsa bile görev bilinciyle hareket edecek ve tekno kardeşlerimin koruyucusu olacak, onları geleceğe taşıyacağım. Tek başıma."
languages.original_text: "Though our fate is implacable, I, Pasqal Haneumann, will follow my sense of duty and become a protector to my tech-brethren, leading them into the future. Alone."

traits.locale_text: "Kaderimiz değiştirelemez olsa bile ben, Pasqal Haneumann, görev bilinciyle hareket edecek ve tekno kardeşlerimin koruyucusu olacak, onları geleceğe taşıyacağım. Kendi başıma."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
